article:
These days, it is found that school students hardly have any sports. Is it because they have no  _ in sports? Maybe it is true. They often say they have more important things to do. What are these important things? Exams! They have to _ themselves ready for all kinds of exams and tests in school. They have to _ all their time preparing their lessons, even on summer holidays. So _ have kept them away from sports.
They can't do anything they like. _ their parents and teachers give them more pressure,they have to work _ and spend most of their time on books. And the students themselves don't want to _ the exams. They want to go on with further studies. So they have to _ up their school sports.
It's true that physical training is good for your healthy. A quick mind hardly works without a _ body. If you can never do anything well, _ can you make great success in life?
